definition: another name for Xishi 西施[Xi1 shi1]
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. Xishi clasps at her heart (idiom)/fig. a woman's lovely looks, despite the pangs of illness

sentences.english: Si-Zih-Wan is one of the scenic spots in Kaohsiung.
sentences.chinese: 西子湾是高雄的其中一个风景。

sentences.english: The beautiful West Lake, is there a fairy tale of love in the growth?
sentences.chinese: 美丽的西子湖畔，是否会有爱情的童话在生长？

sentences.english: HengYe Medical Equipment Limited Company. Hangzhou is located beside the beautiful west lake.
sentences.chinese: 恒业生物工程有限公司位于美丽的西子湖畔。

sentences.english: Our hotel is a three-star hotel located at the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们饭店是一所位于西子湖畔的三星级涉外饭店。

sentences.english: West Lake took hold of the hands of the blue sea. Monkey Lele staged a shinning debut in Cannes, France.
sentences.chinese: 西子湖牵手蔚蓝海岸，美猴乐乐闪亮登场法国戛纳。

sentences.english: In the far distance was seen the glittering surface of the West Lake surrounded by green hills.
sentences.chinese: 远处就可看到西子湖波光荡漾的湖面，四周青山环抱。

sentences.english: The construction of Xizi Ecological Farm was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了西子生态农场建设的情况。

sentences.english: I like to watch sunset in Si-Zih-Wan.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在西子湾欣赏日落。

sentences.english: Since then, the West Lake has another elegant name Xizi Lake.
sentences.chinese: 自那时以来，西湖有另一种优雅的名字西子湖。

sentences.english: Intime Department Store and the West for a hundred large stake in joint control, there are precedents.
sentences.chinese: 银泰百货与西子联合争夺百大股份的控制权已有先例。

sentences.english: If I am going to Si-Zih-Wan, which line should I take?
sentences.chinese: 如果我要去西子湾，我该搭哪条线？

definition: beautiful woman
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon

Xishi (c. 450 BC), famous Chinese beauty, foremost of the four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], given by King Gou Jian 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4] of Yue as concubine to King of Wu as part of a successful plan to destroy Wu
graceful/tactful
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
(literary) that person (usually female)/she/one's intended
limpid autumn waters (trad. description of girl's beautiful eyes)
brink/edge
mist covered water
misty rain/drizzle
to wash silk
Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
other name of the Xiangjiang river 湘江[Xiang1 jiang1] in Hunan province
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
drizzle/fine rain
